fluvius-core 1.3-SNAPSHOT API

Packages 
Package Description
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api
Provides the top-level Fluvius API.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.compilation
Interfaces for compilers which compile Flows into a FlowExecutions.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.description
Interfaces pertaining to describing and writing descriptions of Flows.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.functional
Functional interfaces for use in assembling Flows.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history
API for storing and retrieving flow trace information, in the form of FlowEvents emitted during flow execution.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.logging
Logging API for Flow execution.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad
Defines the "scratchpad" abstraction which represents the working state of a Flow.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.services
API for dealing with calls to external services.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing
Provides the API for tracing of flow execution.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.compilation
Classes related to the compilation of Flows into FlowExecutions.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.conditions
Contains classes for working with Conditions.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.describers
Defines a FlowVisitor which constructs a FlowDescription from a Flow, and a PrettyPrintingDescriptionWriter which can pretty-print it to a String.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.exceptions
Defines some custom exceptions emitted by Flows.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.execution
Classes providing flow execution strategies.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows
Provides the fluent Flow-creation and execution API, for which the public entry-point is the Flows class.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.history
Classes relating to the capture, storage and retrieval of Flow execution trace histories.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.logging
Provides a default FlowLogger which prints messages to the console.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.mutation
Provides a utility class for detecting mutation in objects.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.operations
Provides a utility class for constructing Operations.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.preconditions
Provides a utility class for checking preconditions.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.predicates
Provides a utility class for constructing predicates.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.scratchpad
Provides a concrete implementation of Scratchpad, together with the Scratchpads class for creating new Scratchpads.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.services
Classes relating to Flows that involve making calls to external services.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.tracing
Provides a tracing FlowVisitor implementation which constructs a TracedAction.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.visitors
Provides the basic FlowVisitor implementation needed to execute a Flow, together with the Visitors public entry point for obtaining and composing Visitors.
